Code

BLACKWEEK

*Valid from 25.11.2024 until 01.12.2024 on all goods in the TOM TAILOR online shop when entering the discount code: BLACKWEEK and in all participating Tom Tailor stores. CLUB members save 30% on all goods in the TOM TAILOR online shop when entering the discount code: CLUBBW and the CLUB ID in the checkout. And in all participating Tom Tailor stores. You can find participating stores at tom-tailor.eu/retail-stores. The discount cannot be combined with other promotions. The discount cannot be used to purchase vouchers and does not include shipping costs. The code can be redeemed multiple times, but only once per order. The maximum order value in the online shop is €700.
